thread.title: Lauren Hill bobblehead to be given at Tipoff Classic
thread.title_full: Lauren Hill bobblehead to be given at Tipoff Classic

title: Lauren Hill bobblehead to be given at Tipoff Classic
text:
Lauren Hill bobblehead to be given at Tipoff Classic 
Updated: Tue, Oct 13 2015, 06:13 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- There is a new way to honor Lauren Hill while helping cancer research.Five thousand Lauren Hill bobbleheads will be given out at the first Lauren Hill Tipoff Classic at Xavier's Cintas Center on November 14th. The bobblehead immortalizes Lauren making her first basket as a collegiate player.The Tipoff Classic will include a matchup of Xavier's women's basketball team against Evansville and then Mount St. Joseph against Hiram. Tickets are $10 for adults and $5 for kids ages 3-17. They're good for both games of the doubleheader. 
For tickets call (800) 745-3000, go to the Xavier Athletics ticket office or GoXavier.com or Ticketmaster.com . Ticket proceeds from the games will go to The Cure Starts Now Foundation. 
(Photo: Xavier University)
